bibl.title: Mimas and Aiolos in Ausonia.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LVII, 3876, fr. 62. An explanation of the funeral scene beside the shore may be suggested. The cousin of Aiolos is tending the pyre and corpse of Aiolos; the place is Surrenton beside the Bay of Naples.
bibl.seg: HUXLEY George, Mimas and Aiolos in Ausonia.

P. Oxy. LVII, 3876, fr. 62. An explanation of the funeral scene beside the shore may be suggested. The cousin of Aiolos is tending the pyre and corpse of Aiolos; the place is Surrenton beside the Bay of Naples.
